question.questionText: Trace over the complete circuit with your pencil to show where it is. Even though there is a complete circuit, the bulb will not light. Why not?

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The circuit does not include both contact points on the bulb holder, so the electricity can not go through the bulb.
